concept.title: Primetime ad server metadata
concept.shortdesc: supports resolving and inserting ads for VOD and live/linear streams.

note.p: Before you can include advertising in your video content, provide the following metadata information:

ul.li: A mediaID, which identifies the specific content to play.
Your zoneID, which identifies your company or website.
Your ad server domain, which specifies the domain of your assigned ad server.
